Whoo-hoo Screwed up the resolution again. FFS, you're supposed to use numbers divisible by 16 that most closely approximate the required AR. Sure, 1280/690 comes to 1.85 but, for ****'* sake, 690 isn't divisible by 16. You're supposed to use 688. Video compression works best with numbers divisible by 16. When RU gonna get this? You're doing a great job, making a lot of people happy, no doubt. All the more reason to get it absolutely right.
So 2.35 AR --> 1280x544 and 1.85 AR --> 1280x688
Jeez!
